Text:
googled this, its an indie horror game based on the slenderman mythos, and it looks pretty good. If you like it you should also try SCP containment breach, if you havent already. I could play Amnesia all the way through to the end and, but i cant handle that game for more than ten minutes or so without feeling like im going to have a heart attack.

By the way Maverick, thanks for posting this, the creator's site seems to be down so this might be the only place to get it for a while.
SEED THIS FUCKING SHIT YOU FUCKING BITCHES!

Update to earlier comment:

Played game. Crapped self. Going to find a puppy and play with it so slenderman doesn't haunt my dreams (And change pants).
It is pretty sad you cannot seed your own fucking torrent. Especially when the upload is only 40 megabytes
Works well, thanks Mav, +1 rep, cheers.
